EmailTemplate.name: McDonald's Direct Mail - July 8th
EmailTemplate.subject: Stay connected and productive in the office, restaurant and on the go.
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Untitled Document
888.263.3423 (888-2-OFFICE)
My Account Technology Furniture Ink & Toner Paper Office Supplies
Stay connected and productive in the office, restaurant and on the go.
Office Depot® is proud to be your partner! As a McDonald’s owner/operator, take advantage of exclusive pricing and discounts on a huge selection of tech accessories from the brands you know and trust, including:
•
Keyboards and mice
•
Routers and other networking solutions
•
Hard drives, flash drives and storage
•
Speakers and headphones
•
Cases, charging cables and other tablet/smartphone accessories
The right products. The right prices. The right people. That’s our recipe for success.
Contact your dedicated Account Manager today:
Timothy Lebar 855.337.6811 Ext. 16524 timothy.lebar@officedepot.com
Gabriel Escobar 855.337.6811 Ext. 12692 gabriel.escobar@officedepot.com
